data.eml:eml: Brachyceran Diptera (Insecta) in Cretaceous ambers, Part IV, Significant New Orthorrhaphous Taxa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grimaldi, David A., Arillo, Antonio, Cumming, Jeffrey M., Hauser, Martin (2011): Brachyceran Diptera (Insecta) in Cretaceous ambers, Part IV, Significant New Orthorrhaphous Taxa. ZooKeys 148: 293-332, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.148.1809, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.148.1809
